Business continuity risks related to disruptions of operationsAutodesk’s Global Business Continuity Program seeks to:
Protect the Business and People from threats to our operations such that critical business functions  
may incur an unacceptable interruption caused by:
 ●Impact to our facilities
 ●Threats or outages affecting critical systems, applications, and data
 ●Impact to or loss of key vendors
 ●Regional events such as natural or man-made disasters, acts of war, or terrorism
 ●Long-term occurrences, such as pandemics 
Protect Shareholders from threats to company reputation related to any of the incidents listed above.
